8158 
8195 typedef struct
8196 {
8197  const void * pSrc; /* device memory pointer */
8198  int nSrcStep;
8199  void * pDst; /* device memory pointer */
8200  int nDstStep;
8201  Npp32f * pTwist; /* device memory pointer to the color twist matrix with floating-point coefficient values to be used for this image */
8202 } NppiColorTwistBatchCXR;
